description: This is a modern 'Global View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(machine_cpu_cores{node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(machine_cpu_cores{node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(machine_memory_bytes{node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(machine_memory_bytes{node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"})

panels.description:
utilization: how often the memory is used
occupied amount: how much of the memory is taken up by program data

targets.expr: sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{instance=~"$node_instance", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum((DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{instance=~"$node_instance", gpu=~"$gpu"} + DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE{instance=~"$node_instance", gpu=~"$gpu"}) * on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"})

panels.title: GPU memory (avg)

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) 
/
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}) 
*
sum((DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{instance=~"$node_instance"} + DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE{instance=~"$node_instance"}))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) 
/
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}) 
*
sum((DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{instance=~"$node_instance"} + DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE{instance=~"$node_instance"}))

sum(avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu", node=~"$node_instance"}[$__rate_interval])* on(pod, namespace) group_left(phase) max by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) by (namespace)
